commit message: fix layout rotation and rounded edges on the color squares
fix horizontal view of color chooser dialog
improve the way the color chooser looks on different devices
better organize player color code into its own view
fix the way the color chooser looks on tablets
add colors to database, also keep track of when scores were modified
tone down the tag bullet so it doesn't clash too much with the new colors
move the bullet to the right instead of the left of the player's name
allow editing the colors from the edit activity
allow players to disable colors, adjust the saved settings dialog to fix #65, add customization of + and - buttons to fix #29
allow 7-inch tablets to show onscreen buttons for up to 6 players, fix font sizes on 7- and 10- inch tablets, fixes #66
xxxhdpi and xxhdpi images for icon
fix unit tests, begin adding color picker
ensure timeline isn't shown if the game was from an older version of keepscore
Add a beautiful real-time history graph, fixes #61
start working on portrait mode and >8 players
use view stubs for better performance
use game summaries instead of games on the main screen for performance improvements
fix the player score display on portrait
Japanese and French translations for v1.3.0, add untranslated strings in comments for Italian and German, improve French translation in general
ensure orientation changes when the setting is changed
bring back the little divider on portrait view
fragmentize the HistoryActivity so that everything loads faster and is swipeable
1.3.0-rc2, fix bug in the backup feature
ensure preferences are refreshed after modifying button values, string changes
whoops, forgot to implement hashCode() and equals()

Italian translation updated

I've updated the Italian translation to make ver. 1.3.0 completely transalted.
I've just let unchanged 'Portrait' 'Landscape' and 'Timeline' because they are more often used in their English version also in Italy.
